   |
19 | optional message Foo {
   | ^^^^^^^^

   |
24 |     repeated oneof y {
   |     ^^^^^^^^

   |
28 | repeated enum Bar {}
   | ^^^^^^^^

   |
30 | stream extend Foo {
   | ^^^^^^

encountered 6 errors
